content:
<rule id="logging-usage-00160" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="logging{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration>
                    <when>
                        <not>
                            <file filename="logging-{*}.jar"/>
                        </not>
                    </when>
                    <perform>
                        <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded library - Logging Utils">
                            <description>The application embeds a Common Java Logging Utils library.</description>
                        </classification>
                        <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Logging Utils</technology-tag>
                    </perform>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
